headline: EFOS UV/VISIBLE SPOT CURE SYSTEM
description: UV/Visible Spot Cure System     Intensity up to 20 W/cm2 with appropriate filter Efos Novacure N2001-A  Efos has been acquired by EXFO
categories.lvl2: Optical / Photonic Equipment  >  Lamps > Curing Lamps
specstable:
Manufacturer Efos
Model Novacure N2001-A
Description UV/Visible Spot Cure System
Lamp Type & Power Mercury Vapor Short Arc, 100W
Lamp UV Output up to 20 W/cm2
Liquid Light Guide Included No
Interface RS 232
External Cooling Air Cooled
Accessories Light guide and filter not included(inquire regarding availability)
Other Information
  • Units are shipped with used working lamp

System Features and Specifications:
  • Microprocessor controlled exposures with closed loop feedback system
  • Shutter and exposure verification alarms
  • Built-in radiometer for accurate calibration
  • History download to PC capability via RS232
  • Remote operation capability via standard 15 pin connector
  • Units are shipped with used working lamp
Power Requirements 120/240 V 1.5 A 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Condition Very Good
